post:
Hi, I'm Hassan from ReverseHosts.com and I wanted to send in this exclusive offer for LowEndTalk only. These are hosted in Datashack's DC in Kansas City, MO. They are **OpenVZ** plans under SolusVM.


**[VPS 512](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=16) - $3.99/mo after promocode: 512MBVPS** 
**Disk Space:** 60 GB 
**Bandwidth:** 600 GB 
**RAM:** 512 MB	
**vSwap:** 256 MB	
**IP Addresses:** 1 
**IPv6 Addresses:** 16 (If you need more open a ticket)
**Port:** 1 Gbps 


**[VPS 1024 ](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=47)- $5/mo after promocode: 1GBVPS**
**Disk Space:** 85 GB 
**Bandwidth:** 1500 GB
**RAM:** 1024 MB	
**vSwap:** 1024 MB	
**IP Addresses:** 1 
**IPv6 Addresses:** 16 (If you need more open a ticket)
**Port:** 1 Gbps 


_Test IP:_
74.91.24.135
